english: Mention whenever your privacy is not respected and ask for it to be respected immediately.
Go to the cafeteria whenever you feel hungry and ask for snacks.
Ask someone at the cafeteria to heat your meal whenever it is not warm enough.
Suggest your favorite meals at the reception and cafeteria.
Call the caregiver or other staff whenever you feel that your safety is threatened.
Make sure that your possessions are safe before leaving them.
Provide feedback at the reception about what things to be improved at the care facility.
Plan more "going outdoors" time with your caregiver.
Ask to be transferred in a more quiet place whenever you feel disturbed by the noise.
Make your own schedules, but make sure to notify your caregiver and not to disturb others.
Tell your caregiver to offer you more quality attention.
Tell your caregiver how to serve you better.
Share your reflections with your caregiver.
Be less demanding and more friendly.
Suggest your favorite activities to be included in the schedule.
Report at the reception or other relevant staff whenever someone disrespects you.
Don't hesitate to express your opinions.
Communicate more with other people in the care facility.

dutch: Zeg het wanneer je privacy niet gerespecteerd word
Ga naar de cafetaria als je honger hebt en haal een snack
Vraag iemand om je eten op te warmen als het niet heet genoeg is
Roep een verpleegster wanneer je je onveilig voelt
Geef feedback aan de receptie over wat er beter kan in het tehuis
Vertel de verpleegkundige hoe je beter geholpen kunt worden
Vertel de verpleegkundige dat je meer aandacht nodig hebt
